/opt/intel/composer_xe_2013_sp1.1.106/bin/intel64/icpc   -openmp -fno-exceptions -O3 -xHost -vec-report    CMakeFiles/iPic3D.dir/iPic3D.cpp.o  -o iPic3D -rdynamic main/lib/libiPic3Dlib.a /opt/intel/impi/4.1.2.040/intel64/lib/libmpigc4.so /opt/intel/impi/4.1.2.040/intel64/lib/libmpigf.so /opt/intel/impi/4.1.2.040/intel64/lib/libmpi.so /opt/intel/impi/4.1.2.040/intel64/lib/libmpigi.a -ldl -lrt -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/opt/intel/impi/4.1.2.040/intel64/lib
